data.title: That White Paper Guy's Clients
data.meta_description: I've worked with all kinds of B2B firms, from global brands to tiny startups. My clients include household names like Google, IBM, and Verizon, plus lots of smaller firms with big ideas.
data.text:
I've written about B2B software, hardware, and services, for firms that do everything from designing virtual worlds to controlling industrial processes.

Here is a list of some selected clients by industry. After this is a list of selected clients by company name.

B2B services

10e20 • New York City • search engine optimization
